content:
<ce:table colsep="0" frame="topbot" id="t0030" rowsep="0" xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/cals/dtd">
<ce:label>Table 6</ce:label>
<ce:caption id="cn0080">
<ce:simple-para id="sp0090" view="all">Results of DFT calculations for Zn, Cd and Hg complexes with the MPC ligand in coordination mode A together with their total energy and r.m.s. deviation.</ce:simple-para>
</ce:caption>
<tgroup cols="3">
<colspec align="left" colname="col1"></colspec>
<colspec align="left" colname="col2"></colspec>
<colspec align="left" colname="col3"></colspec>
<thead>
<row rowsep="1" valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd"></entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>E<inf loc="post">t</inf>
</italic> (a.u.)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">r.m.s. (Å)</entry>
</row>
</thead>
<tbody>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Zn</entry>
<entry align="char" char="." xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">−2483.2308</entry>
<entry align="char" char="." xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1.723</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Cd</entry>
<entry align="char" char="." xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">−6171.0629</entry>
<entry align="char" char="." xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1.755</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Hg</entry>
<entry align="char" char="." xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">−857.4917</entry>
<entry align="char" char="." xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1.636</entry>
</row>
</tbody>
</tgroup>
</ce:table>
clean_text:
Table 6. Results of DFT calculations for Zn, Cd and Hg complexes with the MPC ligand in coordination mode A together with their total energy and r.m.s. deviation.

|       | Et (a.u.)   | r.m.s. (Å) |
|-------|------------|-----------|
| Zn    | −2483.2308 | 1.723     |
| Cd    | −6171.0629 | 1.755     |
| Hg    | −857.4917  | 1.636     |
